channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Dapper Labs makes 3rd round of cuts in 9 months amid NFT slump
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: NFT collectibles company Dapper Labs has said goodbye to another 51 employees only months after a 20% staff reduction in February.

item.title: Bitcoin ETF would be the 'seal of approval' from SEC: Mike Novogratz
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The Galaxy Digital founder believes approval of a spot Bitcoin ETF would essentially be a United States regulator and government nod for Bitcoin.

item.title: IRS investigating crypto traders using Puerto Rico tax breaks: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: “The noose is tightening” for wealthy Americans suspected of exploiting Puerto Rico’s relaxed tax regime.

item.title: What to expect from the first Coinbase-SEC hearing
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: As the first hearing since the SEC lawsuit on June 6, the conference is expected to be "procedural and administrative," though it may also give a sense of the litigation's tone.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting the Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: US senators reintroduce crypto bill aimed at comprehensive regulation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The Responsible Financial Innovation Act will establish guardrails “to prevent another FTX-style event from occurring” in the wake of the 2022 market crash and bankruptcies.

item.title: US government moves nearly 10K Bitcoin worth over $300M related to Silk Road seizure
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The government previously promised to liquidate approximately 40,000 remaining BTC from the seizure in “four more batches” over the remainder of the calendar year.

item.title: ‘AI helps traders utilize more intuitive strategies,' says exchange
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Bitget currently has a martingale AI trading bot and a grid trading AI bot on its platform.

item.title: BNB’s soaring futures open interest and regulatory woes weigh on the altcoin’s price
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Persistent regulatory actions and concerning derivatives data are likely the main factors behind BNB’s bearish price action.

item.title: Google Play Store officially allows NFT games, but not gambling ones
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The store’s team said games can offer NFTs for sale or to earn, but developers must declare this feature in their game's descriptions and must not allow gambling.

item.title: PwC hedge fund survey finds crypto remains viable despite recent market turmoil
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The portion of traditional hedge funds investing in crypto fell, but many of those still in the market plan to increase crypto investing this year.

item.title: Bored Ape floor price falls below 30 ETH: Nifty Newsletter, July 5–11
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: A decentralized finance borrower used a nonfungible token representing a luxury watch to take out a $35,000 loan.

item.title: CFTC case against Digitex futures exchange and CEO results in $16M court order
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The commission filed charges against Digitex and CEO Adam Todd in September 2022 for alleged price manipulation and failure to register.

item.title: Price analysis 7/12: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, SOL, LTC, MATIC, DOT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin continues to face strong resistance at $31,000, but supportive macroeconomic factors could tilt the advantage in favor of the bulls.

item.title: Cosmos-based Osmosis launches concentrated liquidity, lets LPs choose price
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The new feature offers higher fees to LPs who provide liquidity within tighter price ranges but also causes them to not earn fees if the price goes outside of the range.

item.title: European regulator releases consultative paper on MiCA standards for crypto asset service providers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The European Securities and Markets Authority will release three consultations as it fulfills its mandate under MiCA regulations.

item.title: Elon Musk kickstarts new AI company to ‘understand the universe’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: "The goal of xAI is to understand the true nature of the universe," the company wrote.

item.title: Bitcoin mining difficulty hits all-time high as BTC miner selling peaks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: In recent weeks, BTC miners sent a record amount of Bitcoin to exchanges right as the network’s difficulty metric hit a new all-time high.

item.title: Blockchain Association calls for investigation into Prometheum over alleged ‘sweetheart’ SEC deal
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The group raised concerns over Prometheum’s changing position on crypto regulatory clarity and under what circumstances the firm obtained a special purpose broker-dealer license.

item.title: What is QuillBot, and how to use it?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jagjit Singh
item.description: QuillBot is an AI-powered writing tool that helps users improve their writing once they simply enter the text and explore the suggestions.

item.title: Crypto scams are down 77% — but this exploit is making a huge comeback
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Attackers of this kind are supposedly "big game hunting” large-scale organizations with deep pockets to extract ”the most money possible” out of these firms.

item.title: Blockchain gaming platform creates refundable NFT program
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Spielworks CEO Adrian Krion said that the NFTs will also provide mining power and material drops to players of their Dungeon Worlds game.

item.title: Coinbase Wallet launches instant messaging feature with XMTP
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The new feature offers end-to-end encrypted private messaging for anyone with a cb.id username, .eth domain, or Lens ID.

item.title: AI in healthcare: New tech in diagnosis and patient care
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Shiraz Jagati
item.description: From enhancing disease diagnosis to personalizing patient care, here’s how AI can reshape the future of healthcare.

item.title: Bitcoin’s pre-halving rally may start soon — Here’s why
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: On this week’s episode of The Market Report, Cointelegraph’s resident expert discusses if this is your last chance to buy Bitcoin on the cheap as the Bitcoin pre-halving rally may be right around the corner.

item.title: Ethereum TPS boost? Starknet ‘Quantum Leap’ goes live
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Uri Kolodny, the co-founder and CEO of StarkWare, said that Starknet’s latest Quantum Leap upgrade makes high TPS a reality on the Ethereum mainnet.

item.title: South Korea to ask firms to disclose crypto holdings from 2024
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: After initially mandating public officials to declare their crypto, the South Korean authorities now want all local firms to disclose such holdings.

item.title: European Banking Authority calls for early adoption of stablecoin standards
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: EBA officials anticipate a surge in stablecoin issuance in the coming months and have urged businesses to use its guiding principles before restrictions are implemented.

item.title: Why is Bitcoin price up today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.category: is the Bitcoin bear market over
item.description: Bitcoin price is up today as traders await the U.S. consumer price index (CPI) data and the BTC supply on exchanges drop to a five-year low.

item.title: How to use chatbots for virtual assistance
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Learn the key strategies for leveraging chatbots in virtual assistance, from setting goals to designing intuitive interfaces and continuously enhancing their performance.
